values.description: Market orders are instructions to trade a specific number of units, regardless of the fill price. To fill an order quickly, use a market order.
values.keywords: market orders, send a market order, immediate order fills, order properties, market on open order, limit order book, order ticket, market fill-timeout period, asynchronous orders
